title: Inting ban
body: Can i ask you riot what is your meaning of setting 5 different bans and you only ban toxic player what is the meaning of intentional feeding ban ?

replies.body: riot doesn't ban inters, trollers, or ragequitters, bro. they just give you an automated ban if you type one of their buzzwords
Than why they have bans for inting and others stuff ? just remove all bans and let the ban for toxic exist what a bad company :)
well that's you're answer. they're a terrible company. note the downvotes: people love to suck up to them because they can't stand the possibility that authority is flawed
